messages.subject: Re: geographical humor
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 05/01/2003 12:59:10 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... They are. When my partner hired a new employee, Deb, who is black, we discovered this. Deb
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 05/01/2003 12:59:10 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

> oh thank you for sending this, it was great.
>
> I have been asked for my green card, asked if we have paved roads and
> flush toilets, ask if I have to only drink bottled water, ask if I have
> to go through customs, if I can bring back blankets or large hats, it's
> amazing how stupid so many people are...
>
>

They are. When my partner hired a new employee, Deb, who is black, we
discovered this. Deb went to the bank (Fleet, mind you) to open a new bank
account. She was asked for her green card or some other form of ID proving
that she was in the states legally.

Deb moved to Massachusetts from Cleveland, where she had lived her entire
life. The guy wouldn't believe her.

Later the Bank Manager worked VERY hard to make Deb feel better, including
buying her dinner and offering her free banking for the rest of her life.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
